text: Turlough Convery is a Northern Irish actor, best known for his roles in Killing Eve (series 3) and Sanditon. He attended Rockport School in Holywood and Our Lady and St Patrick's College in Belfast, where he received a number of drama prizes. He also trained in Musical Theatre at the Guildford School of Acting, where he won the 2013 Stephen Sondheim Society Student Performer of the Year Award. He has since appeared in films such as Ready Player One and television series such as My Mad Fat Diary, 'Fresh Meat, Black Mirror, Poldark, and Les Misérables. https://www.popsugar.co.uk/entertainment/photo- gallery/46869776/image/46869774/New-Turlough-Convery/amp ==References== Category:People educated at Rockport School Category:Alumni of the Guildford School of Acting
title: Turlough Convery
